channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Pothole Lodge Hill Welling, 5th February
item.description:
Tuesday evening 03/02/2026 I struck a deep pothole on Lodge Hill. The following Wednesday morning I found my nearside front tyre was flat. I replaced with the spare and took the car to Dartford Tyres Thursday Morning

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lodge Hill, Welling
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unavoidable pot hole, 5th February
item.description:
Sort out how your contractors fill in pot holes. It has clearly been filled in before and hasn't worked. Consistently happens across the borough. If I'm the contractor I'm laughing. Do a shoddy job and get to re do it again a couple of months later, printing money.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chislehurst Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
